Tricks

-   Use `validate()` and `req()` to avoid buggy stuff.

-   [Use jobs to keep your console open and check changes automatically.](https://github.com/sol-eng/background-jobs/tree/main/shiny-job)

-   Use `reactiveConsole(TRUE)` and `input <- reactiveValues()` to see what's going on.

-   Use observers to display messages or data. As a debugger
